backend/main.mo: Main Motoko canister implementing access-controlled user profiles, history content with media, membership registrations, and club/social/branding data storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature requests to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of key frontend source files across components, pages, hooks, and layout.
frontend/docs/android-apk-from-pwa.md: Guide explaining how to generate an Android APK from the PWA using Bubblewrap and Trusted Web Activities.
frontend/docs/production-deploy-google-s: Guide outlining production deployment steps and Google Search Console verification for the application.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based style definitions specifying color variables, theming tokens, and dark mode variants.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry defining meta tags, SEO configuration, PWA setup, and loading the React application root.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, theme colors, and display settings for installation.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Robots configuration allowing general crawling while blocking admin routes and referencing the sitemap.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: XML sitemap listing public site routes with change frequency and priority settings.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing install, activate, and network-first fetch caching for PWA offline support.
frontend/scripts/verify-gsc-meta.ts: Checks dist/index.html at build time for the required Google Search Console verification meta tag and exits with an error if missing.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines the application's router structure, mapping routes to pages and initializing SEO URL updates.
frontend/src/components/admin/MediaPicke: Provides a file picker UI for uploading images or videos, handling validation, progress display, and preview removal.
frontend/src/components/AdminGuard.tsx: Protects admin-only pages by redirecting non-admin users to the login page and showing an access denied message.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with branding, quick links, and dynamically loaded social media icons.
frontend/src/components/HomeBottomNavMen: Provides a mobile bottom navigation menu using a sheet UI for quick access to primary routes and the 'Me' link.
frontend/src/components/InstallPromptBan: Displays a PWA install prompt banner when the app is installable, allowing users to install or dismiss.
frontend/src/components/SettingsSheet.ts: Shows a settings panel with theme toggling, share-link copying, and PWA install options.
frontend/src/components/TopNav.tsx: Implements the top navigation bar with branding, links, mobile menu, settings access, and logout handling.
frontend/src/config/branding.ts: Defines a default logo path and returns either a provided branding logo URL or the fallback.
frontend/src/config/navLinks.ts: Exports static site navigation links and a hook that returns the appropriate /me route based on admin status.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user's Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminSession.ts: Maintains a persisted admin login state using hardcoded credentials and sessionStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and stored identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/usePwaInstallPrompt.t: Handles PWA install prompt availability, dismissal tracking, and detecting installation state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines react-query hooks for fetching and mutating branding, history content, memberships, and clubs via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Provides theme state with light/dark toggling and applies stored theme preferences.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme variables and base typography styles.
frontend/src/layouts/AppLayout.tsx: Defines the main application layout with top navigation, footer, and routed page content.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, Internet Identity provider, React Query client, and global CSS.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the public About page with the organization's story plus mission, vision, and values sections using styled cards and text content.
frontend/src/pages/AdminAboutPage.tsx: Provides an admin interface to view, edit, add, and remove About page sections, including media, with save and status handling.
frontend/src/pages/AdminBrandingPage.tsx: Allows admins to update branding assets such as the organization logo, handling loading, errors, and save state.
frontend/src/pages/AdminClubsManagerPage: Admin tool for creating, editing, and deleting clubs, supporting form-based editing, success/error states, and confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Displays the admin dashboard with links to branding, home page, about content, and other management tools, along with logout functionality.
frontend/src/pages/AdminHistoryEditorPag: Provides an admin interface to edit and save the organization's history text and associated media using query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/AdminHomePageEditorPa: Allows admins to edit, add, and remove home page sections with text and images, then save them via a mutation.
frontend/src/pages/AdminLoginPage.tsx: Renders the admin login form, handles authentication, and redirects authenticated admins to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/AdminMembershipReview: Fetches and displays membership registration submissions for admins to review, handling loading and error states.
Lets admins view and update the organization's social media link URLs with save feedback and validation.
frontend/src/pages/ClubDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed info for a single club, including loading, error, and notâ€‘found states using fetched club data.
frontend/src/pages/ClubsPage.tsx: Fetches and lists all clubs in a grid with loading, error, and empty states, linking to individual club pages.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Shows contact methods including email, phone, address, and office hours using static card components.
frontend/src/pages/EventsPage.tsx: Renders a static list of upcoming events with details like date, time, location, and type badges.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryPage.tsx: Fetches and displays organizational history content with optional media and loading/error handling.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Builds the homepage with hero content, dynamic sections from queries, and default fallbacks for 'What We Do'.
frontend/src/pages/MembershipRegistratio: React page rendering a membership registration form with submission handling and a post-submit success alert.
frontend/src/pages/ProgramsPage.tsx: Displays a grid of predefined youth programs with icons, descriptions, ages, and schedules.
frontend/src/utils/media.ts: Utility functions for validating media files, converting files to Uint8Array, and determining preview URLs and file types.
frontend/src/utils/seo.ts: Provides helpers to update canonical and Open Graph URLs for SEO.
frontend/src/utils/theme.ts: Manages theme persistence and application using localStorage and DOM class toggling.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hashes, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project scope, architecture notes, known issues, and existing implemented features.
